00021 #define min(A, B)       (A<B ? A : B)
00022 #define max(A, B)       (A>B ? A : B)

00024 
00025 int gettoken(char buffer[30], FILE *f){
00026   int i=0;
00027   char ch;
00028   buffer[i]=0;
00029   while(fread(&ch,sizeof(char),sizeof(char),f)!=0){
00030     if((ch!=10)&&(ch!=13)&&(ch!=32)&&(ch!='\t')&&(ch!='&')&&(ch!='(')&&(ch!=')'))
00031       buffer[i++]=ch;
00032     else if(i!=0){
00033       buffer[i]=0;
00034       return i; //return the length of the token
00035     }
00036   }
00037   if(feof(f)&&(i!=0)){
00038     buffer[i]=0;
00039     return i;
00040   }
00041   return 0; //error in reading or end of file
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool FileName(char fname[30], char *str){
00045   int i=0;
00046   if(str==NULL)  return false;
00047   while((str[i]!='.')&&(str[i]!=0)){
00048     fname[i] = str[i];
00049     i++;
00050   }
00051   fname[i]=0;
00052   if(str[i]==0) return false;
00053   return true;
00054 }

00056 void theta_phi_bounds(Triangle_3 tr, double *mintheta, double *maxtheta, double *minphi, double *maxphi){
00057   double th0, th1, th2, phi0, phi1, phi2;
00058   double r0, r1, r2, s0, s1, s2;
00059   
00060   r0 = sqrt(pow(tr[0].x(),2) + pow(tr[0].y(),2) + pow(tr[0].z(),2)); 
00061   r1 = sqrt(pow(tr[1].x(),2) + pow(tr[1].y(),2) + pow(tr[1].z(),2)); 
00062   r2 = sqrt(pow(tr[2].x(),2) + pow(tr[2].y(),2) + pow(tr[2].z(),2)); 
00063   
00064   s0 = sqrt(pow(tr[0].x(),2) + pow(tr[0].y(),2));
00065   s1 = sqrt(pow(tr[1].x(),2) + pow(tr[1].y(),2));
00066   s2 = sqrt(pow(tr[2].x(),2) + pow(tr[2].y(),2));
00067   
00068   th0 = atan2(s0, tr[0].z()); 
00069   th1 = atan2(s1, tr[1].z()); 
00070   th2 = atan2(s2, tr[2].z());
00071   
00072   phi0 = atan2(tr[0].y(), tr[0].x()); 
00073   if(tr[0].y() < 0.0) phi0 += 2.0*M_PI; 
00074   if(fabs(phi0-2.0*M_PI)<1e-6) phi0 = 0.0;
00075   
00076   phi1 = atan2(tr[1].y(), tr[1].x()); 
00077   if(tr[1].y() < 0.0) phi1 += 2.0*M_PI; 
00078   if(fabs(phi1-2.0*M_PI)<1e-6) phi1 = 0.0;
00079   
00080   phi2 = atan2(tr[2].y(), tr[2].x()); 
00081   if(tr[2].y() < 0.0) phi2 += 2.0*M_PI; 
00082   if(fabs(phi2-2.0*M_PI)<1e-6) phi2 = 0.0;
00083   
00084   *mintheta = min(th0, th1);  *mintheta= min(*mintheta, th2);
00085   *maxtheta = max(th0, th1);  *maxtheta= max(*maxtheta, th2);
00086   *minphi = min(phi0, phi1); *minphi = min(*minphi, phi2);
00087   *maxphi = max(phi0, phi1); *maxphi = max(*maxphi, phi2);
00088   
00089   Plane_3 h(Point_3(1.0,0.0,0.0),Point_3(0.0,0.0,1.0),Point_3(-1.0,0.0,0.0));
00090  
00091   if(!((h.oriented_side(tr[0])==h.oriented_side(tr[1]))&&(h.oriented_side(tr[1])==h.oriented_side(tr[2])))){
00092     //the triangle pass through the great circle phi = 0
00093     //if maxphi < M_PI/2 we must not reverse the phi bounds
00094     if(*maxphi>M_PI){
00095       double temp;
00096       temp = *minphi;
00097       *minphi = *maxphi;
00098       *maxphi = temp;
00099     }
00100   }  
00101 }

00104 void SphericalHarmonic(int l, int m, double theta, double phi, gsl_complex *res){
00105   double plm;
00106   plm = gsl_sf_legendre_sphPlm (l, abs(m), cos(theta));
00107   if(m==0){
00108     GSL_SET_COMPLEX(res, plm, 0.0); 
00109   }
00110   if(m>0){
00111     GSL_SET_COMPLEX(res, plm*cos(m*phi), plm*sin(m*phi)); 
00112   }
00113   if(m<0){
00114     GSL_SET_COMPLEX(res, pow(-1,m)*plm*cos(m*phi), pow(-1,m)*plm*sin(m*phi));
00115   }
00116 }
